metadata.name: DirectorySearcher Powershell Exploitation
metadata.comment: Enumerates Active Directory to determine computers that are joined to the domain

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.directoryservices.directorysearcher')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.propertiestoload.add')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.findall()')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('properties.name')))

output.summary: Enumerates Active Directory to determine computers that are joined to the domain
